message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll compromise, but let's be reasonable. I need more than 40% to make it worth my while.
You compromised, now it's my turn. Meet me in the middle of our last offers.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but 38% is simply too low. Let's meet halfway between our last offers.
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better. Consider this my final 'reasonable' offer.
Alright, Bob, let's get this done. I'm offering you a slightly better deal than your last offer, but I'm not going any lower.
